Class TurnTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.TurnTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class TurnTimer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    The timer for the turn of a player, it is relative to a single game.
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TurnTimer.ForceEndTurn
      The timer task to force the end of the turn of a player.

    • Constructor Summary

      TurnTimer(Model game)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(java.util.Observable observedPlayer, java.lang.Object playerStatus)
      When the turn timer receives an update from a player it checks if it is interesting to him, meaning that the update involves a change of the turn, in that case handles the scheduling of a new task and cancels the old one

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TurnTimer

        public TurnTimer(Model game)
        Constructor for a turn timer. Adds the turn timer as an observer to all the players of a game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game we want to time

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable observedPlayer,
          java.lang.Object playerStatus)
        When the turn timer receives an update from a player it checks if it is interesting to him, meaning that the update involves a change of the turn, in that case handles the scheduling of a new task and cancels the old one
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
